label: HazardousMaterial
comment: Material which exhibits adverse effects on living organisms.

datatypeProperties.comment: A product certificate applicable to this production waste material component.
A characteristic applicable to this trade product.
A prominent attribute or aspect of an object, such as recyclability of a product, which can meet customer needs without compromising the ability of future generations to meet their own needs.
The textual description of the biological severity of this toxicological hazardous material.
A textual description of the entry route of this toxicological hazardous material.
The name, expressed as text, of the reproductive toxin in this toxicological hazardous material.

referencedBy.comment: An applicable toxicological hazardous material for this distinct chemical.
